subject: Football
Traffic Accidents and Safety
Deaths (Fatalities)
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: Nose tackle Josh Brent was charged with intoxication manslaughter after the vehicle he was driving flipped, killing Jerry Brown, a linebacker on the Cowboys’ practice squad.
snippet: Nose tackle Josh Brent was charged with intoxication manslaughter after the vehicle he was driving flipped, killing Jerry Brown, a linebacker on the Cowboys’ practice squad.
